articles.title: Dow falls 500 points and tech stocks slide - CNN
articles.description: US stocks closed lower Thursday as concerns mounted about expensive tech stocks, and a risk-off sentiment spread through markets after new data showed a bleak outlook for the job market.

articles.title: Peloton recalls 833,000 bikes after reports of injuries - TechCrunch
articles.description: The Consumer Product Safety Commission is warning Peloton users to stop using the affected bikes immediately.
articles.content:
Peloton is recalling around 833,000 of its original Bike+ machines following reports that some seat posts broke during use, according to the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC).

articles.title: Blue Origin plans second launch of New Glenn mega-rocket on November 9 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Blue Origin's first New Glenn launch in January mostly went well, and now the long-delayed second mission is finally ready for takeoff.
